title: Wifi goes on and off ONLY when playing LoL with mac
body: The wifi just keeps go on and off continuously when i play Lol with my MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Early 2015). I haven't encountered any problems like this and it's so frustrating that i keep dcing:( any way to solve the problem??

replies.body:
Given that your wifi completely turns on and off when you play League indicates that there is some sort of weird setting that might be causing this to happen.  Unfortunately, this is not something I can help with on Boards since we'll need to get a better idea of your exact connection configuration.  To that end, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and provide us the following info:


1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#mq3)
